name: Let's repair all this junk floating down the river next to where we live!
name_original: Let's repair all this junk floating down the river next to where we live!
description:
There's things floating down the river. And they're all broken! You can break down these broken things or repair them with the scrap that you get. Repair and rebuild to expand your village and your society!

For Global Game Jam 2020

Updated releases at: https://github.com/Wingedevil/congenial-sniffle/releases/

Play online here: https://wingedevil.github.io/congenial-sniffle/docs/index.html
